mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", o2.name as "office.name", o2.phone as "office.phone", u.name as "office.master", a.money AS "money", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.status_code AS "statusCode", a.status_name AS "statusName", a.comment AS "comment", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = o2.primary_person
mapper.select: SELECT sum(CASE WHEN status_code IN (10, 11, 12, 22) THEN money ELSE 0 END ) AS gainIntegration, sum(CASE WHEN status_code IN (20, 21) THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS usedIntegration, sum(CASE WHEN status_code IN (30) THEN money ELSE 0 END) AS expireIntegration FROM biz_money_recode

SELECT office_id, sum(CASE WHEN status_code IN(10, 11, 12, 22) and create_time >= (concat(YEAR(now())-1,'-01-01')) and create_time <= (concat(year(now())-1,'-12-31')) THEN money ELSE 0 END )AS gainIntegration, sum(CASE WHEN status_code IN(20,21) and create_time >= (concat(YEAR(now())-1,'-01-01')) and create_time <= (concat(year(now()),'-07-01')) THEN money ELSE 0 END)AS usedIntegration FROM biz_money_recode GROUP BY office_id
